resources.string: As you can see in the above screenshot, the option shows up when you right-click on any message. You can also hover over it and click the three dots to access the “Reply” option. It works for all messages including those sent by you. The quoted reply feature is nothing new in the messaging or collaboration tools, but the feature has been missing from the Teams desktop client. In a roadmap update, Microsoft previously confirmed that quoted replies will come to the existing Electron client, but this feature is nowhere to be seen yet.
